caption.center: In the Matter of NED P. ROGOVOY, an attorney at law.

opinion.opinion_text:
DISCIPLINARY MATTERS ORDER This matter having been duly considered by the Court, it is ORDERED that the suspension of NED P. ROGOVOY, of MILLVILLE, who was admitted to the Bar of this State in 1973, is lifted, and he is hereby restored to the practice of law, effective immediately; and it is further
ORDERED that NED P. ROGOVOY reimburse the Ethics Financial Committee for appropriate administrative costs, including reproduction of transcripts, according to the repayment plan approved by the Disciplinary Review Board; and it is further
ORDERED that, pursuant to this Court's order of October 8, 1985, Charles Girard, Esquire, shall serve as respondent's proctor, said proctorship to continue for one year in accordance with Administrative Guideline No. 28 and until further order of this Court.Page 609
